intro: Irlbachia pulcherrima, commonly known as the golden bell plant, is a flowering species native to tropical regions of South America. Irlbachia pulcherrima is cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a houseplant due to its vibrant blooms and adaptability to various growing conditions.
